name: Tommy
message: Hold fast to dreams for if dreams die life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly ⌛

name: Sonny
message: It was a long time ago. I have almost forgotten my dream. But it was there then, in front of me 😍

name: Lonnie
message: What happens to a dream defferred? Does it dry up like a raisin in the sun? ☢

name: Tommy
message: Bring me all of your dreams, you dreamers. Bring me all your heart melodies ❤

name: Lonnie
message: Now dreams are not available to the dreamers nor song💔
